Name: Gericonia 2
About the game: You are the leader of a new Settlement. Sent from the Capital, your goal is to tame the lands and uncover secrets. In this strategy game, you will build a city and manage different resources. Expand your town, battle outsiders, master the unknown and launch expeditions. Key Features Build homes for your people to live in. Research new ways to improve your Settlement. Battle hunger as you progress through the seasons. Defend your Settlement from the natives that inhabit the land. Launch expeditions to further improve your town and fight ancient beasts and uncover treasures.
Meta Title: Gericonia 2: Feb 3, 2020, Simon Eriksson and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Gericonia 2? Check out the release date (Feb 3, 2020), developer insights from Simon Eriksson, and a complete game summary.
